Developer and Entrepreneur

I am a student studying Computer Science and Entrepreneurship/Innovation at University of California, San Diego, graduating in June 2022. I've always been in love with technology and interested in coding & finding solutions improve the world.

https://eatplatter.com

Platter

Worked as CTO, managing team of 7. Creating mobile application that provides marketplace for homecooked meals. Performed extensive user & market research, and worked with designers to optimize user experience.

React Native, Expo, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase Auth, MongoDB, AWS S3

https://github.com/UCSD-Global-TIES

Schoolhouse Ghana

Served as Software Team Lead, managing 5 team members,, developing software system for students in Ghana to get constant access to school resources, despite lack of internet accessibility.

React, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, Raspberry PI

http://coviddaily.info/

coviddaily.info

Created a full-stack web application tracking COVID stats as well as news articles for any region in the world. Leverages data through worldometer.

React, Typescript, Python, Flask, Web Scraping (BeautifulSoup)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FBeKVBKQoDQ&feature=youtu.be&ab_channel=DanielTruong

Don't Back Out

IOT slouch detector device & mobile application which helps users fix their bad habits of bad posture. Mainly worked on creating the mobile application interface and connecting the software with the hardware.

Android, Android Studio, Java, Arduino, C, Bluetooth
